author: Brianna McCaddenBrianna McCaddenBrianna McCadden
title: Makeshift marathon supports people in need
text:
Over 120 student-athletes on the track and field team at St. Mary participated in an ultramarathon, running 56 miles as a team all throughout the school to raise money for My Brothers Table.
Their goal this year was to beat last year‚Äôs total of $4,200 raised for The Martin Richard Foundation.
‚ÄúWith a team of over 120 athletes, it‚Äôs incumbent to be part of the community and incumbent to be teaching great athletes to also be great people and citizens,‚Äù the track and field head coach, Tristan Smith said. ‚ÄúAnd that‚Äôs what My Brothers Table does more than anybody else.‚Äù
The event was initially supposed to take place outside, but even with the rain and heavy winds, the athletes could pivot and set up a course that equated to 400m, with each running twice around it to meet the desired end goal.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre going to do the best we can do, even with this weather,‚Äù Stacy Drector, teacher of grades k-6 said.
She further mentioned that some of the donations were sponsored per lap and some were just straight donations.
When the event was about to begin, all the athletes gathered around a tent that was meant to mark the start and finish line, in their new bucket hats, which they received right before the event. The athletes created a tunnel around it to cheer on those that who were running and passing through.
One of the runners, Andreas Roumeliotis, discussed more about what this marathon meant to him as a participant.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre helping out the community around us,‚Äù Roumeliotis said. ‚ÄúBeing from Lynn, it‚Äôs really nice to be able to give back to the community, especially because they help us out so much here with volunteers and buses.‚Äù
As the race continued, each runner passed their baton off to their next teammate; the students kept a tally going on the whiteboard until it would get to 200 tallies, or 50 miles.
The cheers for their teammates never got quieter because the athletes who had already finished their part scattered around the course to cheer on those still running.
When they reached the final 50 miles, coach Smith called out and asked for 12 more students to go. Without hesitation, a few stepped up and ran a few more laps, with an end total of 56 miles.
Smith remarked that the fundraiser would continue for another week, and that he, like everyone else there that day, hopes to beat their record for giving back.

author: Syndicated Content
title: Israel military court extends house arrest of soldiers accused of Palestinian prisoner abuse
text:
JERUSALEM (Reuters) ‚Äì Israel‚Äôs military court has extended the house arrest of soldiers accused of sexually abusing a Palestinian detainee until Sept. 4 but will allow the defence to hold a hearing on Sunday to request an alternative to detention, the military said on Thursday.
It specified such an alternative could include ‚Äòa place of work and suitable supervisors‚Äô.
The soldiers have been accused of sexually abusing a member of an elite Hamas unit at the Sde Teiman detention facility in the Negev desert in southern Israel, according to Israeli press reports.
The United Nations special rapporteur on torture has said the alleged sexual abuse case is ‚Äúparticularly gruesome‚Äù and called on Israel‚Äôs civilian courts to investigate and hold the perpetrators to account.
The U.N. has received multiple reports of alleged torture against Palestinians detained since Oct. 7, 2023, when Hamas-led militants stormed Israel in a shock assault that killed some 1,200 people.
More than 40,000 people have been killed in Gaza in the 10 months of fighting that have followed, according to health officials in the Palestinian enclave.
(Reporting by Maytaal Angel; editing by Jonathan Oatis)

author: @infoitsalute
title: Influenza aviaria, primo caso umano grave negli Stati Uniti
text:
Influenza aviaria, primo caso umano grave negli Stati Uniti
Articolo Precedente
Articolo Successivo
Negli Stati Uniti, la preoccupazione per l'influenza aviaria √® in costante aumento. Il governatore della California, Gavin Newsom, ha dichiarato lo stato di emergenza a causa della crescente diffusione del virus H5N1 tra i bovini da latte. La decisione √® stata presa in seguito alla conferma del primo caso grave di infezione umana da parte dei Centri per il controllo e la prevenzione delle malattie (CDC). L'infezione, che ha colpito un uomo in Louisiana, √® stata contratta attraverso il contatto con uccelli malati o morti in un allevamento di uccelli nel suo cortile.
La situazione in California √® particolarmente critica: il virus √® stato rilevato in 645 aziende lattiero-casearie, la met√† delle quali negli ultimi 30 giorni. Questo aumento esponenziale dei contagi tra gli animali ha spinto le autorit√† a prendere misure straordinarie per contenere la diffusione del virus. "Il virus sta entrando nell'uomo", ha dichiarato il governatore Newsom, sottolineando la gravit√† della situazione.
Il caso umano in Louisiana rappresenta un campanello d'allarme per le autorit√† sanitarie, che temono una possibile trasmissione del virus tra gli esseri umani. Al momento, tuttavia, non ci sono prove di una trasmissione interumana del virus H5N1. Le autorit√† sanitarie stanno monitorando attentamente la situazione e hanno intensificato le misure di controllo e prevenzione per evitare ulteriori contagi.
L'influenza aviaria √® una malattia virale altamente contagiosa che colpisce principalmente gli uccelli, ma pu√≤ infettare anche altri animali e, in rari casi, gli esseri umani. Il virus H5N1, in particolare, √® noto per la sua alta mortalit√† tra gli uccelli e per la sua capacit√† di causare gravi infezioni respiratorie negli esseri umani.

author: CartaCapital
title: Novos bombardeios israelenses matam 92 pessoas no L√≠bano
text: Mundo Novos bombardeios israelenses matam 92 pessoas no L√≠bano Israel j√° rejeitou os pedidos por cessar-fogo e afirmou continuar√° lutando ‚Äòat√© a vit√≥ria‚Äô CartaCapital26.09.2024 19h12 Os bombardeios israelenses no L√≠bano mataram 92 pessoas e feriram outras 153 nesta quinta-feira 26, segundo o Minist√©rio da Sa√∫de do Pa√≠s. Os ataques ‚Äúdo inimigo israelense‚Äù resultaram na morte de 40 pessoas no sul do L√≠bano, 25 na regi√£o de Baalbek-Hermel (leste), 23 no Vale do Beqaa (leste) e 4 na regi√£o do Monte L√≠bano (centro-leste), informou o minist√©rio. Mais cedo, Israel voltou a rejeitar os pedidos por cessar-fogo e afirmou continuar√° lutando contra o movimento islamista Hezbollah no L√≠bano ‚Äúat√© a vit√≥ria‚Äù. Pelo quarto dia consecutivo, Israel efetuou uma s√©rie de bombardeios contra redutos do Hezbollah no L√≠bano, enquanto o grupo apoiado pelo Ir√£ disparou mais uma vez proj√©teis contra complexos militares israelenses. Israel indicou que matou o chefe da unidade de drones do Hezbollah, Mohamed Srur, em ‚Äúbombardeios de precis√£o‚Äù no sub√∫rbio sul de Beirute. Balan√ßo Um total de 1.540 pessoas morreram no L√≠bano em quase um ano devido aos bombardeios israelenses como parte dos confrontos transfronteiri√ßos com o Hezbollah, que aumentaram dramaticamente esta semana, disse a ag√™ncia libanesa de gest√£o de desastres nesta quinta. Segundo essa unidade, 1.540 pessoas morreram, 60 delas nas √∫ltimas 24 horas, e 5.410 ficaram feridas em quase um ano devido a estes confrontos entre Israel e o grupo islamista pr√≥-iraniano. (Com informa√ß√µes da AFP). Apoie o jornalismo que chama as coisas pelo nome Muita gente esqueceu o que escreveu, disse ou defendeu. N√≥s n√£o. O compromisso de CartaCapital com os princ√≠pios do bom jornalismo permanece o mesmo. O combate √† desigualdade nos importa. A den√∫ncia das injusti√ßas importa. Importa uma democracia digna do nome. Importa o apego √† verdade factual e a honestidade. Estamos aqui, h√° 30 anos, porque nos importamos. Como nossos fi√©is leitores, CartaCapital segue atenta. Se o bom jornalismo tamb√©m importa para voc√™, nos ajude a seguir lutando. Assine a edi√ß√£o semanal de CartaCapital ou contribua com o quanto puder. Leia tamb√©m Mundo Israel rejeita tr√©gua com o Hezbollah e prepara ‚Äòposs√≠vel‚Äô ofensiva terrestre no L√≠bano Por AFPhttps://www.cartacapital.com.br/mundo/macron-pede-que-israel-detenha-escalada-no-libano-e-a-hezbollah-que-pare-de-atirar-contra-israel/?utm_medium=leiamais&utm_source=cartacapital.com.br Macron pede que Israel ‚Äòdetenha escalada no L√≠bano‚Äô e a Hezbollah, que pare de atirar contra Israel Por AFPhttps://www.cartacapital.com.br/mundo/onu-reporta-90-mil-novos-deslocados-no-libano-por-bombardeios-israelenses/?utm_medium=leiamais&utm_source=cartacapital.com.br

author: St√©phane Ficca
title: Sudoku, mots-crois√©s‚Ä¶ Pourquoi le chinois Tencent vient-il de d√©bourser 1,2 milliard de dollars ?
text:
Il y a quelques semaines, Ubisoft subissait une d√É¬©gringolade historique en bourse, le titre passant m√É¬™me en dessous des 10√¢‚Äö¬¨ √É la fin du mois de septembre, soit son niveau le plus bas. Quelques jours plus tard, ce dernier remontait brusquement √É 14√¢‚Äö¬¨, bien aid√É¬© par une rumeur de rachat de la part d‚Äôun certain Tencent. Depuis 1998, le groupe chinois (plus ou moins) discr√É¬®tement envahi de nombreux march√É¬©s, notamment la messagerie, les jeux vid√É¬©o, la mobilit√É¬© ou encore la publicit√É¬© en ligne.
Le chinois Tencent fait main basse sur le sudoku, les mots-crois√É¬©s et autres puzzles sur mobiles
Aujourd‚Äôhui, le groupe chinois renforce encore un peu plus sa pr√É¬©sence sur le march√É¬© du jeu vid√É¬©o mobile, en s‚Äôoffrant, par l‚Äôinterm√É¬©diaire de sa filiale Miniclip, le groupe Easybrain. Une transaction (en cash) qui s‚Äô√É¬©l√É¬®ve √É 1,2 milliard de dollars, et qui permet donc √É Tencent de mettre la main, sur cet √É¬©diteur de jeux mobiles.
Au catalogue d‚ÄôEasybrain, on retrouve des jeux tr√É¬®s simples, mais aussi tr√É¬®s (tr√É¬®s) populaires, comme Killer Sudoku, Nonogram, Pixel Art, Art Puzzle, Differences, Groovepad‚Ä¶ Bref, des titres qui proposent des mots crois√É¬©s, des mots cod√É¬©s, des sudokus, des puzzles‚Ä¶ et qui sont t√É¬©l√É¬©charg√É¬©s sur des centaines de millions de smartphones iOS et Android √É travers le monde. La firme revendique ainsi 16 millions de joueurs par jour et pas moins de 2 milliards d‚Äôapplications t√É¬©l√É¬©charg√É¬©es au total.
‚ÄúAlors que le march√É¬© d‚ÄôEasybrain se transforme, Miniclip est l‚Äôacheteur strat√É¬©gique id√É¬©al pour permettre √É l‚Äôentreprise de rester √É la pointe de l‚Äôindustrie des jeux mobiles ax√É¬©s sur la publicit√É¬©‚Äú, a annonc√É¬© le PDG et fondateur d‚ÄôEmbracer, Lars Wingefors. Rappelons que ce m√É¬™me Lars Wingefors avait d√É¬©bours√É¬© 650 millions de dollars pour s‚Äôoffrir ce m√É¬™me EasyBrain.
Rappelons qu‚Äôapr√É¬®s avoir acquis de tr√É¬®s nombreux studios et autres licences vid√É¬©oludiques tr√É¬®s r√É¬©put√É¬©es, Embracer a annonc√É¬© un peu avant l‚Äô√É¬©t√É¬© sa scission en trois unit√É¬©s √É compter de 2025. La premi√É¬®re sera d√É¬©di√É¬©e aux jeux de soci√É¬©t√É¬© (avec notamment Asmodee), la seconde aux jeux vid√É¬©os √É budget limit√É¬© et la troisi√É¬®me aux licences les plus embl√É¬©matiques.
A ce sujet, rappelons que le groupe Embracer a notamment fait l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢acquisition de Middle-Earth Enterprises, une entreprise qui poss√É¬®de Tolkien Enterprises, permettant d√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢avoir les droits d√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢adaptation de tout l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢univers Tolkien, que ce soit en film ou en produits d√É¬©riv√É¬©s (jeux vid√É¬©o, s√É¬©ries√¢‚Ç¨¬¶). Avec le rachat d√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢Eidos Montr√É¬©al, Crystal Dynamics et Square Enix Montreal, Embracer a √É¬©galement mis les mains sur des licences cultes du jeu vid√É¬©o comme Tomb Raider. A cela s‚Äôajoutent THQ, Aspyr, Deep Silver Volition, Milestone, Tripwire‚Ä¶

author: Robert McGreevy
title: REPORT: Las Vegas Raiders Finally Make The Right Call On Head Coach, Working To Retain Antonio Pierce | The Daily Caller
text:
The Las Vegas Raiders are making the right call and working on a deal to give interim head coach Antonio Pierce the full time gig, according to a report from ESPN‚Äôs Adam Schefter.
Pierce took over as head coach when Vegas fired head coach Josh McDaniels in November. Pierce took the then 3-5 Raiders and finished the season with a 5-4 record , reenergizing a franchise that badly needed it.
DETROIT, MICHIGAN ‚Äì OCTOBER 30: Head coach Josh McDaniels of the Las Vegas Raiders looks on in the fourth quarter against the Detroit Lions at Ford Field on October 30, 2023 in Detroit, Michigan. Mike Mulholland/Getty Images
Raiders are working to finalize a deal to hire Antonio Pierce as their head coach, per sources.
Raiders made Pierce their interim HC on Halloween night and now are closing in on making it a full-time job. Players who campaigned for Pierce soon are expected to be happy. pic.twitter.com/OAJTur9ZJ0
‚Äî Adam Schefter (@AdamSchefter) January 19, 2024
Players will likely be delighted as multiple members of the team have publicly swooned over the former New York Giants linebacker. (RELATED: Kliff Kingsbury Lands Bears Interview All But Guaranteeing Their First Draft Selection, Sources Say: REPORT)
Defensive end Max Crosby, who reportedly was considering demanding a trade if the Raiders didn‚Äôt retain Pierce, said ‚Äúthere‚Äôs only 32 head coaches in the whole world, so you‚Äôve got to find a leader of men. And when you‚Äôve got one of them in the building, I don‚Äôt know why you would let them go,‚Äù according to Adam Schefter.
LAS VEGAS, NEVADA ‚Äì NOVEMBER 12: Offensive tackle Max Mitchell #61 of the New York Jets blocks defensive end Maxx Crosby #98 of the Las Vegas Raiders as he tries to get to quarterback Zach Wilson #2 of the Jets in the third quarter of their game at Allegiant Stadium on November 12, 2023 in Las Vegas, Nevada. The Raiders defeated the Jets 16-12. Ethan Miller/Getty Images
Star wideout Davante Adams said, ‚ÄúHe embodies what it means to be a Raider and that mentality, that swag and all the things that he endorses is the things that I believe in.‚Äù
What Raiders players have said about their new permanent HC Antonio Pierce:
üèàDavante Adams: ‚ÄúHe embodies what it means to be a Raider and that mentality, that swag and all the things that he endorses is the things that I believe in.‚Äù
üèàMaxx Crosby: ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs only 32 head‚Ä¶ https://t.co/RvvGqHKap0
‚Äî Adam Schefter (@AdamSchefter) January 19, 2024
The move appears to be a correction for owner Mark Davis, who last faced a similar decision in 2021. In the wake of a massive scandal , then-head coach Jon Gruden ( legend ) resigned and was replaced in the interim by assistant head coach and special teams coordinator Rich Bisaccia .
LAS VEGAS, NEVADA ‚Äì JANUARY 07: Owner and managing general partner Mark Davis (L) and interim head coach Antonio Pierce of the Las Vegas Raiders greet each other on the Raiders‚Äô sideline before the team‚Äôs game against the Denver Broncos at Allegiant Stadium on January 07, 2024 in Las Vegas, Nevada. The Raiders defeated the Broncos 27-14. Ethan Miller/Getty Images
Bisaccia, like Pierce, had the respect and admiration of the players and steered the Raiders to a 7-5 record, as well as a playoff berth. But instead of retaining him, owner Mark Davis chose to hire McDaniels, a move Crosby said ‚Äúfucked it all up.‚Äù
Bisaccia went on to the Green Bay Packers where he is now the assistant head coach on a team that‚Äôs competing for a Super Bowl. McDaniels is on his couch.
Luckily for Raiders Nation, this time they got it right.

author: lefigaro.fr
title: D√©parts en vacances : le week-end s‚Äôannonce charg√© sur les routes, Bison-fut√© voit rouge samedi
text:
D√©parts en vacances : le week-end s‚Äôannonce charg√© sur les routes, Bison-fut√© voit rouge samedi Par Elisa Hermet Publi√© il y a 11 heures , Mis √† jour il y a 11 heures Lire dans l‚Äôapp Copier le lien Lien copi√© Mail Facebook Twitter Linkedin Messenger WhatsApp Un samedi rouge dans le sens des d√©parts est pr√©vu, et une circulation difficile sur l‚Äôensemble du pays. annacovic / stock.adobe.com En ce second week-end du mois d‚Äôao√ªt, les vacanciers seront nombreux √† prendre le volant. Il va falloir faire preuve de patience.
Si vous devez partir en vacances ce week-end, sachez que vous √™tes loin d‚Äô√™tre les seuls. R√©sultat : les routes seront charg√©es et Bison Fut√© pr√©voit des probl√®mes de circulation sur l‚Äôensemble du pays, en particulier le samedi dans le sens des d√©parts. Le vendredi et le dimanche devraient √™tre plus d√©gag√©s malgr√© des embouteillages par r√©gion.
Quart Nord-Ouest, √éle-de-France et c√¥te m√©diterran√©enne en jaune Ce vendredi 9 ao√ªt , la circulation s‚Äôannonce fluide sur l‚Äôensemble du territoire de mani√®re g√©n√©rale. Par moments, et par endroits, la circulation s‚Äôannonce plus dense. Dans le sens des d√©parts, les difficult√©s de circulation devraient commencer √† partir de 13h sur l‚ÄôA4, au niveau de Coutevroult. L‚ÄôA1, l‚ÄôA10, l‚ÄôA11 et l‚ÄôA13 seront √©galement concern√©s du milieu d‚Äôapr√®s-midi jusqu‚Äôau d√©but de la nuit. Dans le sens des retours, hormis l‚ÄôA4 dense √† hauteur de Coutevroult tout au long de la journ√©e, les autres autoroutes satur√©es ne le seront qu‚Äô√† partir du milieu d‚Äôapr√®s-midi. Le trafic sur les autoroutes 1, 10, 7, 8, 9 et 54 sera dense localement et sur une dur√©e maximale de cinq heures, selon Bison Fut√©.
La circulation sera dense sur le quart Nord-Ouest, l‚Äô√éle-de-France et la c√¥te m√©diterran√©enne ce vendredi. Capture d'√©cran des pr√©visions Bison Fut√© (site gouvernemental) Samedi rouge dans le sens des d√©parts Ce samedi est pr√©vu rouge par Bison Fut√© √† l‚Äô√©chelle nationale dans le sens des d√©parts. Les autoroutes 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 61, 62, 63, 71 et 74 ainsi que les nationales 165 et 205 seront denses √† satur√©es au fil de la journ√©e. En particulier, dans le sens des d√©parts, l‚ÄôA10 sera satur√©e de Paris √† Bayonne toute la journ√©e avec des pics sur certains segments. De Lyon √† Orange, via l‚ÄôA7, les routes seront congestionn√©es de 5h √† 18h. Dans le sens des retours, les embouteillages commenceront en milieu de matin√©e et se poursuivront jusqu‚Äôen fin de soir√©e sur les principaux axes reliant les c√¥tes √† l‚Äô√éle de France.
Samedi rouge dans le sens des d√©parts et en √éle-de-France dans le sens des retours. Capture d'√©cran des pr√©visions Bison Fut√© (site gouvernemental) Un dimanche satur√© par endroits, fluide √† l‚Äô√©chelle nationale Le dimanche 11 ao√ªt s‚Äôannonce beaucoup plus tranquille sur les routes √† l‚Äôexception de la r√©gion Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes dans le sens des d√©parts et du chass√©-crois√© en √éle-de-France. Les autoroutes 6, 7, 10 et 71 ainsi que la nationale 205 seront denses √† satur√©es par moments dans le sens des d√©parts. Pour les retours, seuls deux points devraient √™tre bloqu√©s jusqu‚Äô√† 20h. √Ä hauteur de Saint-Arnoult-en-Yvelines sur l‚ÄôA10 et de Fleury-en-Bi√®re sur l‚ÄôA6, en √éle-de-France. La circulation sera fluide sur le reste du territoire.
Dimanche vert √† l‚Äô√©chelle nationale avec deux r√©gions satur√©es, l‚Äô√éle-de-France et l‚ÄôAuvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes. Capture d‚Äô√©cran des pr√©visions Bison Fut√© (site gouvernemental)

author: Nouvelles
title: MotoGP en Autriche : Bagnaia √©tablit un record en pr√©-qualifications. 3e Martin, 4e M√°rquez
text:
Pecco Bagnaia a termin√© vendredi en Autriche aux commandes, √©tablissant un nouveau record de piste en 1:28.508. En Q2 √©galement Morbidelli, Martin, Marc Marquez, Binder, Alex Marquez, Espargaro, Vinales, Bezzecchi et Bastianini. Luxation de l‚Äô√©paule gauche pour Di Giannantonio apr√®s une chute pendant la s√©ance : pour le Romain le week-end est d√©j√† termin√©. Qualifications samedi √† 10h50 et Sprint Race √† 15h, le tout en LIVE sur Ciel Sports Un, Ciel Sport MotoGP et en streaming sur MAINTENANT
GP D‚ÄôAUTRICHE, LA COURSE EN DIRECT
C‚Äôest seulement le jour de la promo mais tout Le Red Bull Ring ils s‚Äôeffondrent d√©j√† enregistrer . Il y a pens√© Pecco Bagnaia pour √©tablir le nouveau record, lors des pr√©-qualifications de vendredi, un d√©part pour un samedi qui promet des √©tincelles. Derri√®re lui se trouve une Ducati Pramac, mais ce n‚Äôest pas celle de Jorge Martin mais plut√¥t celui de Franco Morbidelli (le jour de l‚Äôannonce de son d√©m√©nagement √† √©quipe VR46 en 2025). L‚ÄôEspagnol, leader du Championnat du Monde, est pourtant proche, en troisi√®me position, devant Marc Marquez qui cette fois a r√©alis√© son meilleur temps sans voler la vedette √† personne. Bagnaia, vainqueur des deux derni√®res √©ditions du grand prix d‚ÄôAutriche, a √©galement fait preuve d‚Äôune rythme fou r√©alisant d‚Äôexcellents chronos avec des pneus us√©s √† l‚Äôextr√™me.
Aussi les Aprilia dans le top 10, Bastianini en Q2 avec le frisson Ils entrent √©galement dans le top dix, admis en Q2 samedi matin Alex Marquez sixi√®me devant les deux Aprilia Aleix Espargaro et Maverick Vi√±ales ce qui a permis de redresser une situation initialement pr√©occupante en raison de la difficult√© d‚Äôarr√™ter la moto sur un circuit pas vraiment favorable aux caract√©ristiques du RSGP. Enea Bastianini qui a gliss√© √† la fin de son quart de travail, a √©t√© sauv√© avec dixi√®me fois avec difficult√©, derri√®re Marco Bezzecchi .
Binder sauve la KTM, Diggia bless√© Le KTM , qu‚Äôils avaient test√© avant le Grand Prix lors d‚Äôessais priv√©s, sur leur piste nationale, ils ont d√ª se contenter du cinqui√®me place pour Binder . Acosta qui a gliss√© deux fois le matin et une fois l‚Äôapr√®s-midi, est rest√© en dehors du top dix, aux c√¥t√©s de Miller (qui pourrait passer chez Yamaha-Pramac en 2025). Mauvaise chute pour Fabio di Giannantonio transport√© √† l‚Äôh√¥pital pour des contr√¥les : pour lui une √©paule gauche lux√©e et le week-end est d√©j√† termin√©.
\n

author: Anonym
title: [HIGHLIGHTS] ‚ÄúI cried about it‚Äù: Ludovic, star garbage collector from TikTok, will carry the Olympic flame and promises a ‚Äúsurprise‚Äù
text: Ludovic Franceschet will carry the Olympic flame through the streets of Paris on July 15, 11 days before the opening ceremony. Franceschet is famous for his videos highlighting his profession on social networks (nearly 500,000 subscribers, particularly on TikTok and Instagram). "This is a once in a lifetime opportunity. Over 4 billion people around the world will watch this! I represent the message of cleanliness. I will not carry the flame as an agent, but as someone committed to cleanliness on the planet and peace in the world. "I would also like there to be an Olympic truce. In any case, I never imagined that I would get to this point. I can never thank enough the people who discovered me on the networks," he says. "I was called before the holidays, I exploded with joy, I even cried. I almost sat down, but being at work, if 'Saccage Paris' came on, it would have looked bad."
